name: FizX
description:
FizX – level arcade in 2d. The player controls the ball, which must fall into the hole. Gameplay takes place in various contours, in the form of geometric shapes. When the ball is stressed against the wall of the contour, it repels. Moreover, at each level, the number of bounces from the circuit is different. Thus, each level is unique. Aim at the level: hit the ball in the hole so that the number of bounces is enough.

Feature:
Intuitive touch screen control
Stunning graphics and sound
Simple game, just tap the screen to move
Avoid all obstacles on the platform
Easy to play difficult to master
